personas.name: Design Savvy
personas.text: For beauty and brains in the workplace, turn to the ThinkCentre X1 all-in-one PC. This aluminum-forged device is as thin as a laptop, powerful as a desktop. In addition to its exquisite design, the PC features innovative interfaces, integrated security, and an anti-glare display that transform the business computing experience.

personas.name: Power User
personas.text: The ThinkCentre X1 all-in-one desktop delivers the Intel processing power to work with large files. Enhanced security features also help keep the most sensitive data safe. Featuring clutter-free connections to all types of accessories, the device is built to perform and designed to impress.
